tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE digital_asset_ownership (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  previous_owner_id INT NOT NULL,
  new_owner_id INT NOT NULL,
  transfer_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE asset_metadata (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name TEXT,
    asset_type TEXT,
    create_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    update_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE DigitalAssets (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    owner_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    previous_owner_address VARCHAR(255),
    transfer_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE OwnershipTransfers (
    transfer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id UUID NOT NULL,
    new_owner_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    previous_owner_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    transfer_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES DigitalAssets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DigitalAssets (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    owner_address VARCHAR(255),
    token_type VARCHAR(50),
    creation_date TIMESTAMP,
    transfer_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE OwnershipTransfers (
    transfer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT,
    previous_owner_address VARCHAR(255),
    new_owner_address VARCHAR(255),
    transfer_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES DigitalAssets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SmartContracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_address VARCHAR(255),
    is_active BOOLEAN,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Tokens (
    token_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    token_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_id INT,
    token_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    total_supply DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES SmartContracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DigitalAsset (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    owner_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    token_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE AssetTransfer (
    transfer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id UUID NOT NULL,
    previous_owner VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    new_owner VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    transfer_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
